synopsis.p: Projects OBO terms and synonyms on sections.

description.p: reads oboFiles in OBO format and searches for term names and synonyms in sections.

The parameters allowJoined, allUpperCaseInsensitive, caseInsensitive, ignoreDiacritics, joinDash, matchStartCaseInsensitive, skipConsecutiveWhitespaces, skipWhitespace and wordStartCaseInsensitive control the matching between the section and the entry keys.

creates an annotation for each matched entry and adds these annotations to the layer named targetLayerName. The created annotations will have features nameFeature, idFeature and pathFeature set to the matched term name, identifier and path.

If specified, then assumes that trieSource contains a compiled version of the dictionary. oboFiles is not read. If specified, writes a compiled version of the dictionary in trieSink. The use of compiled dictionaries may accelerate the processing for large dictionaries.

param-doc.name: oboFiles
param-doc.p: Path to the source OBO files.

param-doc.name: idFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the matched term identifier.

param-doc.name: nameFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the matched term name.

param-doc.name: pathFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the matched term path.

param-doc.name: keepDBXref
param-doc.p: Add all database cross-references of the term. creates a feature key-value pair for each dbxref in the matching term.

param-doc.name: versionFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to store the ontology version.

param-doc.name: ancestorsFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature that contains the term ancestors ids.

param-doc.name: childrenFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature that contains the term children ids.

param-doc.name: parentsFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature that contains the term parents ids.
